title: Operation Pridefall, Groomers, and Kink at Pride: Part 2
itunes:title: Operation Pridefall, Groomers, and Kink at Pride: Part 2
description:
Gare talks about the anti-LGBTQ+ hate campaign "Operation Pridefall" and how it mirrors the current groomer trend and kink at pride discourse.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
